plugins
Class DrawingPlugin

java.lang.Object
  model.CalculatorPlugin
      plugins.DrawingPlugin

public class DrawingPlugin
extends model.CalculatorPlugin

Allows the user to draw a circle or a graph drawing to the draw view in the calculator gui.

Version:
1.0
Author:
MasonS
